visual.name: iconMapV3
visual.description: Map Visual for Power BI based on the Leaflet library. Provides the ability to draw images, lines, Well Known Text (WKT), GeoJson layers on a map with custom backgrounds, overlays with WMS support.

dataRoles.description: A unique ID to represent each object to display on the map
dataRoles.name: category

dataRoles.description: Longitude of the image, svg or circle.
dataRoles.name: Longitude

dataRoles.description: Latitude of the image, svg or circle.
dataRoles.name: Latitude

dataRoles.description: Longitude of a point to draw a line to.
dataRoles.name: DestinationLongitude

dataRoles.description: Latitude of a point to draw a line to.
dataRoles.name: DestinationLatitude

dataRoles.description: Size of the object. Required for all items. For GeoJSON shapes and WKT (except points) the size has no impact on the shapes, but must be present.
dataRoles.name: Size

dataRoles.description: Field of type Date & Time. Allows the daylight terminator overlay to display as it would at the given time, rather than the current time.
dataRoles.name: Time

mapLayers.description: Background layers appear under the map objects and usually contain sea, land, towns and streets etc.

backgroundMapLayer.description: The background layer of the map. To use Mapbox layers, you will need to enter your Mapbox access token in the box below. To use your own background layer select Custom URI.

enumeration.value: Open Street Map - wmflabs OSM B&W
enumeration.displayName: Open Street Map - wmflabs OSM B&W

enumeration.value: Open Street Map - wmflabs OSM no labels
enumeration.displayName: Open Street Map - wmflabs OSM no labels

customLayerURI.description: Enter the URL of the custom layers.

mapboxAccessToken.displayName: Mapbox Access Token (required for Mapbox layers)
mapboxAccessToken.description: Access token to use Mapbox layers

overlays.description: Overlays are a transparent layer that is added on top of the background layer to add additional information such as weather.

customOverlay.description: Display a custom transparent overlay on the map?

customOverlayURI.description: Enter the URL of the custom layers.

daylightTerminator.description: Realtime layer showing where is in darkness or daylight.

formatting.description: Formatting options for map objects. Does not apply to images.

dashArray.description: Pattern for lines and circle, WKT and GeoJSON borders.

points.description: Settings for the data bound objects on the map.

icon.description: Display an image from an HTTPS or DATA URL, or a WKT object. Use expression based formatting to select a field from your data.

icon2.description: Display an image at the line destination coordinates. Use expression based formatting to select a field from your data.

imageRotation.description: Amount to rotate the image by between 0 and 359

circleAndLines.description: Include a circle (or image if specified above) at the origin of a line. (Does not apply to WKT)

showTooltip.description: Show a tooltip when the cursor moves over an object. Use expression based formatting to define this on an object by object basis.

allowSelection.description: Allow objects to be selected by clicking on them. Use expression based formatting to define this on an object by object basis.

circleSizeType.description: Whether the circles stay the same size when the map is zoomed, or whether they represent a diameter in meters.

sizeBehaviour.description: Size is based on the measure value starting at 0 pixels (explicit) or between a min and max value. If all values are the same the min value will be used.

lineBehaviour.description: Straight lines or following the curvature of the Earth (geodesic)

wms.description: Web Map Service (WMS) is an OCG protocol for serving maps from servers such as ESRI, MapServer and GeoServer. Layers must be hosted on an HTTPS URL and have CORS enabled.

url.description: URL of the WMS server. See icon-map.com for more configuration information

layerName.description: Name of the layer as returned by GetCapabilities. See icon-map.com for more configuration information

format.description: Image format such as image/png or image/svg.

attribution.description: Additional attribution text to be shown at the bottom of the map.

controls.description: Zoom, scales and other map controls

scale.description: Display a scale on the map

attribution.description: Many map layers require attribution text to be displayed on the map. If your custom layer requires this, enter the text here.

geoJSON.description: Add an external GeoJSON layer to the map. GeoJSON layers must be hosted on an external web server using an HTTPS address and have CORS enabled. GeoJSON shapes are referenced by the category field in the dataset which should match a property value for each GeoJSON shape.

noOfLevels.description: Provide multiple geoJSON files for each level of drilldown.

geoJSON1.description: URL to an external GeoJSON file. URL must use HTTPS and the have the WGS84 / EPSG:4326 coordinate system.

geoJSON2.description: URL to an external GeoJSON file. URL must use HTTPS and the have the WGS84 / EPSG:4326 coordinate system.

geoJSON3.description: URL to an external GeoJSON file. URL must use HTTPS and the have the WGS84 / EPSG:4326 coordinate system.

geoJSON4.description: URL to an external GeoJSON file. URL must use HTTPS and the have the WGS84 / EPSG:4326 coordinate system.

geoJSON5.description: URL to an external GeoJSON file. URL must use HTTPS and the have the WGS84 / EPSG:4326 coordinate system.

autoZoomInactivePolygons.displayName: Include inactive GeoJSON shapes in auto zoom
autoZoomInactivePolygons.description: Include GeoJSON shapes not referenced in the data when zooming?

hideMissing.description: Hide shapes not referenced in the data?

missingLineColor.description: Border color of shapes that are not referenced by a data item. Other shapes can be configured in the formatting options.

missingFillColor.description: Fill color of shapes that are not referenced by a data item. Other shapes can be configured in the formatting options.

lineWidth.description: Width of the shape borders. This setting is overridden if a field is included in the Line  Border Width field well.

vectorLayer.description: Add a vector layer to the map, which can be referenced by items in your dataset.

url.description: URL Template for the vector layer

missingLineColor.description: Border color of shapes that are not referenced by a data item. Other shapes can be configured in the formatting options.

missingFillColor.description: Fill color of shapes that are not referenced by a data item. Other shapes can be configured in the formatting options.

lineWidth.description: Width of the shape borders. This setting is overridden if a field is included in the Line  Border Width field well.

coordinateUse.description: Use coordinates as bounds for vector layers.

labels.description: Show a label for each object

text.description: Text to show. Use expression based formatting to select a field from your data

highlighting.description: Control the formatting when objects are selected or cross-highlighted from another visual.

includeLabels.description: Apply the above options to labels as well as objects

zoom.description: Control how zooming of the map behaves

includeInZoom.description: Automatically zoom the map to the data bound map objects. Use expression based formatting to determine which objects should be included or not. If you select No, the map position and zoom level will be retained when saving the report.

zoomOnSelect.description: When you select an object on the map, should the map automatically zoom into that object?
zoomOnSelect.displayName: Auto zoom to items selected on the map

zoomOnHighlight.description: When cross-highlighting objects from another visual, should the map zoom into those highlighted objects?

zoomOnSingleItem.description: Zoom the map when there is only one item present

zoomOnSingleLevel.description: Zoom level when there is only one item present

zoomIncrement.description: Amount that the map zooms in or out

lockMap.description: Prevent the map from being dragged

defaultLatitude.description: Default latitude to center the map. This value can be updated by moving the map.

defaultLongitude.description: Default longitude to center the map. This value can be updated by moving the map.

defaultZoom.description: Default zoom level to center the map. This value can be updated by moving the map.
